Lombre (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0270: Lotad
Pokémon
#0272: Ludicolo →

Lombre has been featured on 13 different cards since it debuted in the EX Sandstorm expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Lombre cards are normally Water-type or Grass-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Lombre

Lombre
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Lombre EX Sandstorm 45/100 Miracle of the Desert 019/053
Lombre EX Sandstorm 46/100 Latias ex Half Deck   006/018
Lombre EX Deoxys 33/107 Clash of the Blue Sky 026/082
Lombre EX Deoxys 34/107 Rayquaza Constructed Starter Deck   004/015
Lombre EX Crystal Guardians 37/100 Miracle Crystal 025/075
Lombre Secret Wonders 54/132 Shining Darkness  
Lombre Platinum 52/127 Galactic's Conquest 007/096
Lombre Plasma Storm 30/135 Plasma Gale 018/070
Lombre Primal Clash 11/160 Tidal Storm 005/070
Latias Half Deck   6/30        
Latias Half Deck   21/30        
Lombre Celestial Storm 37/168 Champion Road 019/066
Lombre Rebel Clash 008/192 Rebellion Crash 004/096
Lombre Evolving Skies 033/203 Skyscraping Perfection 003/067
Lombre Journey Together 036/159 Battle Partners 022/100


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
